description: Products of numbers of faces of Platonic solids, i.e. of {4,6,8,12,20}.
prog: (PARI) ismult(n, v, vp) = {for (k=1, #v, q = n/v[k]; if ((type(q)== "t_INT") && vecsearch(vp, q), return (1)););}lista(nn) = {v = [4,6,8,12,20]; vp = []; for (n=2, nn, if (vecsearch(v, n) || ismult(n, v, vp), print1(n, ", "); vp = concat(vp, n);););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 03 2015
author: _Neil Fernandez_, Jul 02 2001
